reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major solid cancer types: breast cancer (~45 per 100k), lung cancer (~18 per 100k), colorectal cancer (~18 per 100k), prostate cancer (~15 per 100k), gastric cancer (~12 per 100k), liver cancer (~9 per 100k), pancreatic cancer (~7 per 100k), ovarian cancer (~8 per 100k), and other solid tumors (~8 per 100k) = ~120 per 100k. Excludes hematologic malignancies (leukemia, lymphoma). Based on GLOBOCAN estimates, solid tumors comprise ~85% of total cancer incidence globally.
